content: bring a touch of spring indoors with this whimsical wisteria garland complete with soft cascading blooms and leafy foliage inspired by real wisteria vines this decorative crochet pattern is perfect for nurseries mantels party backdrops or anywhere you want a floral pop of charm each flower is built from layered petals that hang gracefully while the leafy vine adds fullness and movement the pieces are small and repetitive perfect for crocheting on the go or as a calming meditative project * this pattern is written using us crochet terms * the wisteria is worked in a spiral creating an illusion of many layers of flowers * you can make it longer or shorter by adjusting the length of your starting chain watch the youtube video for the crochet wisteria 1 pattern watch the youtube video for the crochet leaf vine 2 pattern 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=kcqwrxqh7by 2 https //www youtube com/watch v=u8nmd_ljbu8
